    • Field Detail

      • useStopWordsBeforeTerm

        @ArgumentParser.Option(name="useStopWordsBeforeTerm")
public static boolean useStopWordsBeforeTerm
        allow to match stop words before a target term. This is to match something like "I am on some X" if the pattern is "I am on X"

      • useTargetNERRestriction

        @ArgumentParser.Option(name="useTargetNERRestriction")
public static boolean useTargetNERRestriction
        Add NER restriction to the target phrase in the patterns

      • useNER

        @ArgumentParser.Option(name="useNER")
public static boolean useNER

      • numWordsCompound

        @ArgumentParser.Option(name="numWordsCompound")
public static String numWordsCompound
        Can just write a number (if same for all labels) or "Label1,2;Label2,3;...."

      • numWordsCompoundMapped

        public static Map<String,Integer> numWordsCompoundMapped

      • numWordsCompoundMax

        public static int numWordsCompoundMax

      • useLemmaContextTokens

        @ArgumentParser.Option(name="useLemmaContextTokens")
public static boolean useLemmaContextTokens
        Use lemma instead of words for the context tokens

      • fillerWords

        public static List<String> fillerWords

      • ignoreWordRegex

        public static Pattern ignoreWordRegex
        by default doesn't ignore anything. What phrases to ignore.
